title: World configurations
description: Configuration of the game objects in the world grid.

grid.description: Defines the grid of the game world.

width.description: Defines the width of each block in the grid.

height.description: Defines the height of each block in the grid.

objects.description: Defines the objects in the grid.

items.description: Defines an object in the grid.

position.description:
Defines the position of the object in the grid.
The first element in "blocks" represents the origin.
The others blocks are added from the left to right, top to bottom.

x.description: Defines the x position in the grid.

y.description: Defines the y position in the grid.

canCollide.description: Defines if the object can collide with other dynamic objects.

blocks.description: Defines the matrix representation of each block in the object.

items.description: Defines the path of an image of the block. If an empty string is provided (""), the block is omitted from the grid.
